alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Boyd, southeastern Gallia, southeastern Lawrence, northwestern Mason, Cabell, northwestern Lincoln, west central Jackson and northern Wayne Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong gusts ahead of some thunderstorms extending from 6 miles southeast of Racine to 7 miles west of Buffalo to near Ona to Milton to 7 miles west of Hamlin. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Wayne, Chesapeake, Proctorville, Beech Fork State Park, Barboursville, Milton, Ceredo, Ona, Burnaugh, Durbin, Burlington, Aid, West Hamlin, Crown City, Athalia, Henderson and Leon. This includes Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 3 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
